reviews.review: A great follow up, to an amazing game.
One of the best puzzle games ever.  A must-buy.
So much better than the first game, if you don't have it then buy it!

Recomendadisimo, incluso merece la pena jugarlo sin el primero porque así los trucos con los portales y el ingenio de los personajes es más fresco e interesante. Posible juego del año.

This is a great game!!!

Buy this game right now. It is the funniest, most emotionally rewarding game you will ever play, period. It also has great visuals, amazing audio, and inventive puzzles. 
Buy. This. Game.

Wow, Just awesome game!
Not your typical FPS. 
Puzzles are fun and thought provoking.
Story is interesting with a very dark overtone. However still manages to stay light hearted
Recommend that you play Portal 1 first before playing through Portal 2, in order to get the whole story.

Brilliant! I've only played Single Player so far... (Got 12 hours out of it... mainly because I was just messing about the levels and wandering into Rattman dens.) But the campaigns are absolutely worth it! Can't wait to try multiplayer where I expect to get more for my money's worth! Though with that said, the game is already well worth the money I spent on it.
Play portal. Play Portal 2. Nuff said.

This is an amazing game that is surely worth every last penny. It has provided me with many, many hours of fun and puzzle solving. It has also helped me make new friends in co-op.

This game is much longer and much more detailed than the original Portal. Not saying it's better... but there's just so much more to it! It's incredible!

I do, VERY highly recommend this game to anyone who loves a good game that makes you think, and takes you on a one-of-a-kind adventure.

There's nothing else quite like it.
omg coop = jizz in pants..
Super lustiges Spiel, mit Grips Anstrengung ;)
If you liked Portal you will love Portal 2. They brought back the same basic idea with a whole new twist to it and puzzles even more challenging than the last.
i like this game!! its fun!!!

Do you really need my recommendation to play this game? The hundreds of other legitimate reviewers haven't convinced you that this is a near perfect game from start to finish? The only excuse I can think of for not having already purchased and played this game has to do with being mugged, having your hands cut off and your eyes gouged out, so unless that very specific scenario applies to you, do yourself a favor and set aside some time to Think with Portals
Всем рекомендую ))
It's Portal. But again.
This is by and far the best video game experience I have ever had.
Portal 2 is great!

It's as incredible as I expected it would be.  Highly recommended.
One of the best games I have ever played. It lives up to its predecessor in every way.
Sans doute le meilleur jeu auquel j'ai joué de toute ma vie. Que ce soit pour l'ambiance, les graphismes et le mode de jeu, tout est PAR-FAIT. C'est THE jeu à avoir.
Great story, challenging puzzles, awesome coop and of course more GlaDOS around

You make holes in things, and get yelled at by robots.

I originally bought the game and played through the co-op mode with a good friend of mine. That friend passed away this year, due to cancer. I will always have fond memories of my time playing this with my friend.

macht immer wir spass zum Zocken auch wenn man es schon gefühlt 100 mal durch hat
Amazing game. Fun writing, puzzles and co-op

This game is, without a doubt, one of the best games of 2011. There's no denying this. The story, the gameplay, the music, the characters, everything is just fantasticly put together. Do NOT miss this jewel among games.
E' portal!!! non dico altro
buy it!!

I enjoyed Portal 2. Not as much as the original but it was still good. I love the characters and the world of Portal. The story and setting and were fantastic. But there was something about the game itself that just didn't feel that great, you know? It's short, that's one drawback. But some of the game play and puzzles just seemed boring and restricted. Felt more like you were following a certain more specific path that was not your own. Still, I totally recommend Portal 2. Maybe not for full price, but when it's on sale for like $20 or $30 then go for it.

How can you follow up on the Suprise hit from the Orange Box, how about with a bigger more ambitious game that shows you the history of Aperture Science, and GlaDOS. If you haven't played it, they you should, for Science, you Monster.
The cake remains a lie.
Jeu tout simplement enorme qui est prolonger par la campagne coop .Quand a la campagne solo y vaut mieu avoir fini le premier portal pour mieu suivre et comprendre...
Feels good man
Mind bending fun. But you already knew that...
"Thank you" - The Different Turret
Get it
Haven't been satisfied with a game in a long time but this game takes the cake...
One of the best games of 2011! Buy it, play it, love it! But don't turn into a potato...
omsadasd
The most fun I've had in a 1st person game without shooting anyone :) SP completed - Now Looking for Coop partner.
awesome mindworking game!

Buy it now, seriously. Fantastic first person puzzler with great single player and co-op campaigns.  Improves on the original in every way; which is something since the original Portal is awesome as well. Excellent pacing, hilarious characters, fun puzzles.  I don't know many people who aren't owners of the game at this point, but if you don't have it, I recommend this game w/o hesitation.  It's a lot of fun on your own and with a friend.
Best sequel ever (after TF2)!
A classic sequel to a classic game. Highly recommend getting a friend and trying the co-op. It's a lot of fun and accessible to all skill levels!
Best game of The YEAR!

Uma sequencia genial para um jogo lendário. Com um roteiro absurdamente bem escrito, personagens muito cativantes e puzzles extremamente legais de fazer, esse é um jogo que conseguiu superar as muito altas expectativas. Tanto o single player quanto o modo cooperativo são muito, muito bons, e a expectativa de conteúdo futuro para download só aumenta ainda mais a lista de motivos para se jogar esse jogo.

Portal 2 surpasses the original in every concievable way. It's longer (though still too short for me), harder, funnier, and intorduces the world to one of the most perfect co-op experiences in gaming. All in all, Portal 2 probably the only non-RPG in my top ten favorite games of all time lists, and for those who know me, that's saying a lot.

This game brings everything you loved from the first Portal and morphs it into a full length AAA experience. With new objects like Thermal Discouragement Beams, Aerial Faith Plates, and various Gels, it feels like there is no end to the testing. Simply put, this game is out of this world.
Great Game! After you finish Single Player, you have a whole multiplayer world to explore!
Mejor puto juego que he jugado.
Niin saatanan hyvä peli että pahaa tekee. Vähän olisi saanut olla pidempi coupin osalta.
Great game. Long as well, worth every penny

I cannot praise this game highly enough, I don't have all the right words. The story, characters, voice acting, graphics, mechanics, physics, music, everything is amazing. Play this game. It is the greatest game ever made.
Generic recommendation.

I thought Portal was a great game, but Portal 2 is even better!  As you would expect from a sequel, it revisits a lot of the same concepts (even some of the same test chambers), but it also adds a lot more, such as a cooperative mode, longer single-player, and gels that let you bounce, run faster, or place portals where you otherwise couldn’t.  Solving the puzzles with a friend is great fun, and once you’ve solved them all there are player-created maps you can download and try!
portal 2  modernizza il suo predecessore aggiungendo nuove possibilità di interazionI con l' ambiente, tutto in COOP!!!!

A brilliantly funny and triumphant sequel to one of the most beloved games of all time.  Valve took all the goodness of Portal 1 and turned it up to 11 on gameplay, comedy, and general fun.  This one is right up there with Psychonauts for me in the hall of gaming greatness.
Ein Super Geniales Spiel, kauft es euch ^^

I think everybody know's what portal is, I enjoyed the first game alot, and was hoping for a second game the minute i completed the first.
It's very well made and very original, if u'r thinking about picking this up i reccomend buying portal 1+2 couse the story in portal 2 will come out much better, also portal 1 is a good way to get familliar with the game and its only 3 bucks extra i think?

Years ago Portal was one of the best mods for Half-Life i'¨ve ever played, It would challenge me in ways, that only few before had. But this....This is without a doubt the best stand alone puzzle game of all time. The melodramatic and rather often homicidal robot, GLaDOS is still...well, homicidal AND fun.
And in this day and age everything must have a multiplayer function; and this has that too. So now one can Co-op with his or her friend against all of GLaDOS' deathly traps. For better and for worse; people's skill of teamwork is truly putted to the test!
This CAN be played without any previous knowlegde, however I will encourage you to try out "Portal" before spending your money.
It IS great, but not everyone's cup of tea!
